review.title: “Going through tough times but great place to work”
review.pros: Pros – This is a firm with great people, flexibility, opportunities to take on new challenges. I've learned a lot here and have gotten to work with amazing clients.
review.cons: Cons – The economy has been hard on the firm, leading to instability. Can be a little cliquey. It is not very diverse.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – It will take strong leadership to pull through difficult times. Please do your best to communicate a vision and plan to get through this together.

review.title: “Innovative beginner for a great consulting alternative”
review.pros: Pros – Good organization vision; great initial CEO; wonderful holy talented people
review.cons: Cons – COO was untrustworthy; did not practice thoroughly what was preached and thus did not follow through on measuring and managing consistently against vision and strategies.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Consistency; trust; integrity

review.title: “A good place to grow if you know what you want.”
review.pros: Pros – Capital H Group is full of smart, dedicated people doing work that they care about. They practice what they preach in terms of work-life balance and organizational development. Considerable time and resources go into employees' education and training. It's not always perfect, but it's front of mind, and they try to get it right. The principals and managers have a lot interesting experience and background for younger consultants to learn from.
review.cons: Cons – Many projects are tactical rather than strategic in nature. The point of looking at organizations with a human capital lens is that your people ARE your strategy. Getting clients to understand this often isn't easy, and HR is viewed as a back-office, non-strategic function. As a result, a lot of the work that Capital H Group gets feels like an afterthought.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Keep the fire in the belly for human capital work. Pare away anything that doesn't have that fire.
